turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you put in an order for me at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure; which Starbucks are you headed to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one along Baltimore Avenue in College Park.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Grande?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti, actually.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what kind of milk do you want them to use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Soy, please. If they don't have it, almond is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. It comes with 2 shots, do you want more?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want the standard 3 pumps of vanilla syrup as well?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No; only two pumps of vanilla.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Any other toppings besides the caramel drizzle?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, the drizzle sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How about the amount of foam and the temperature?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Light foam, Steamed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any other add-ins?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's everything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your caramel macchiato is on order at the College Park Starbucks. It will be ready for pickup shortly and your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!
